title: Ep. 24. Petals to the Metal - Chapter Seven
description: BWAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH! That's the sound of a horn, meaning it's time for the Battlewagon Races we've been building up to for six episodes to begin. BUCKLE UP. Taako holds a coronation. Magnus leaps before looking. Merle gets a face hug.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
